Reviews.Title: misunderstood flaws
Reviews.Author: Natasha Hardina
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a year and I didn't like it for the same reasons a lot of other people didn't. It would make calls in my pocket and automatically change the home-screens without permission because the screen wouldn't stay locked in my pocket. Otherwise, I had loved the phone for being one of the few "dumb" phones that is still pretty up to date, like having a touch screen. I had dropped my phone a thousand times and it was still a trooper and worked every time. I reordered the same phone despite the problems I had and hearing that the home-screen "magically" stops working. When I programmed the phone I choose the setting that said "Lock key only" meaning the only way to unlock the front screen is to press the unlock button on the side of the phone and none of the front buttons will work which gave it the appearance that the front screen wasn't working. That setting (and understanding that setting) fixed all the problems I had with the phone and the ones I read on the amazon reviews. So the negative review on this phone (phone calls in the pocket, home-screen pictures changing, and flawed front screen) is really just misunderstanding how the phone works. I would give this phone 5 stars but it took me a year to figure out how to properly use the home-screen lock function.

Reviews.Title: Coool.
Reviews.Author: MyPenNameOkayCool
Reviews.Content: Okay so I've had this phone for about a year.In my opinion it's a trooper.I had spilt canola oil on the screen and except for darkening the screen,it worked fine.I'm very clumsy so naturally I dropped it ALOT,and except for the paint chipping a bit it worked lovely.The Cons are that it freezes if you overwork it or the graphics are a bit poor but otherwise it's great!I love my little trooper <3

Reviews.Title: Great phone according to son
Reviews.Author: rgoodi
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace one just like it that was, "ahem" inadvertantly, destroyed. Works great, will last long with the proper attention.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: KGeorge
Reviews.Content: received quickly, did not have a problem activating it, but original owner forgot to remove all their pictures from the phone.

Reviews.Title: samsung phone
Reviews.Author: mac2
Reviews.Content: would have liked a manual but otherwise it is just what I needed.  The phone is in good working order.

Reviews.Title: really nice phone
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter to replace her old one that stop working.We love it look brand new..

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Jeanne B
Reviews.Content: I love my phone! I didn't want a smart phone, I just wanted a phone for talking and texting.  This one is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: RODNEY MULLINAX
Reviews.Content: Thank you for the phone. I wrecked my other in the ocean. I do not use data and this phone works great for that. Thank you again.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Tristan Schell
Reviews.Content: Good phone for the price, It gets the job done. Will update if problems occur. It is a basic/feature phone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect! better than my old one!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Blevins-Perez
Reviews.Content: Just like my old one except ten times better. Especially for it being a used phone. Mine was brand new but didn't run as fast as this one.

Reviews.Title: Yes, I can hear you now!
Reviews.Author: DRosas
Reviews.Content: This phone has become one of my very favorites! I received it very quickly, I was very worried since it was not brand new, but I have had no problems at all with it. I use to have the Envy and this one is a lot like it, but just a little bit better! Great deal!

Reviews.Title: Awsome!!!
Reviews.Author: Jarrett D Pruett
Reviews.Content: Phone was was exaclty how it was described in the listing and was shipped very promptly.  I got it in just under a week!  Also it came with both a wall and mobile (automobile) charger.

Reviews.Title: Reality is really a great phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Janice Antley
Reviews.Content: While Verison doesn't offer this phone anymore, I would highly recommend it. When we ordered it they offered it with the $10 limited data package. It works great in this capacity.

Reviews.Title: Full of Glitches and unrelaible
Reviews.Author: tleew13
Reviews.Content: The very first night i got this phone it was shut off to charged and never started again.After getting several replacements it was nothing but headaches running into the same problems with every phone. I went through 6 of them before I gave up and every single one would freeze and never turn on again.

Reviews.Title: SCAM
Reviews.Author: JOD
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone that was advertised as "new".  Not so new...when I tried to activate it with Verizon, it would not work.  Verizon informed me that the phone had been on several other service lines, so it was not NEW!  Talk about a rip off since I had the option of new or used and I chose new just to be on the safe side.  Although because Verizon wants these junk phones off the market, they sent me a phone for nothing that they referbushed in return for the phone that I paid for that didn't work.

Reviews.Title: i was so nervous about buying a used phone online but this phone was in fantastic shape!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: i have no complaints.....shipping was super fast. phone was in near perfect condition. I have been ussing for a week and no problems. it was so easy to activate at verizon. this seller can definitely be trusted. please keep up the good service and quality because i will continue to recommend to my friends.

Reviews.Title: not good for networking
Reviews.Author: rhonda palomarez
Reviews.Content: wasn't what I thought it was internet is not good for networking and its way to old school to use for any business matters. trying to sell but have unsuccessful

Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: ALEXANDER I DEMKIW
Reviews.Content: My wife really liked this phone, so I got her another one since it was falling apart.  I knew this phone was used when purchasing; however, it was a little more beat up than expected.  Luckily I was able to buy a cover to hide it.

Reviews.Title: Nice basic phone
Reviews.Author: Beckie L.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a replacement for my 13 year old after his previous one went in the river with him. Its a good basic phone with touch screen and slide out key board as he requested but isn't a smart phone, so doesn't require a data plan. Came promptly and packaged well.

Reviews.Title: Phone not working properly
Reviews.Author: Peggy Troxel
Reviews.Content: Screen is very scratched, touch screen doesn't work properly, bought to give as a gift for Christmas, not satisfied, person I bought it from said only had 14 days to return and it was an older phone, so I shouldn't expect it to be that good. Said it was one of their old phones and he wasn't surprised the screen didn't work that well. He said I could return it if I decided to, but his 1st. message to me was, I had had it too long. I guess Im stuck with it, but I wont order from him anymore, plus you know on a phone, it takes some getting used to to see if they work properly. I would gladly take another phone in better condition, but guess I learnt my lesson. No, Im not very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: OK, but has seen some moisture
Reviews.Author: sss5720
Reviews.Content: For one of my kids to replace one that quit working.  Verizon store checked inside and said that there was some moisture in there at one time (near battery?) but that it should still work.  Have not had any problems with it at all, but would have liked to have known about this issue at time of purchase.

Reviews.Title: not impressed
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: I got the phone on time but a week after having it the phone stopped working. Found out it had previous water damage. So had to buy another phone! Not happy with this purchase at all

Reviews.Title: No scratches on screen a bonus
Reviews.Author: Likebia Jones
Reviews.Content: Refurbished but touch screen responds to every request very well. Always a good reliable back up phone when needed asap.

Reviews.Title: Not "very good".
Reviews.Author: Chrissy Concannon
Reviews.Content: Though this came extremely quickly (within 4 days) it is not what I was hoping for at all. It's a used phone so I knew what to expect in terms of normal phone wear, but the back is falling off at the top, the scuffs on the screen are substantial in size and are clearly visible with the screen on, the micro USB port cover is missing, and there are chips out of the body of the phone (small). As far as the use of the phone, the screen doesn't respond as well because of some of the scuffs, and in some places it wasn't responding for me at all. I couldn't get to the main menu or the messages at all, so I couldn't even program the thing to use it. I was buying this as a replacement phone because my current phone drops calls but I've had mine for 2.5 years and it's in WAY better shape than this. Used phones always have their issues but the phone was no where near "very good", as it was advertised. Not happy at all with the purchase, will be returning. :/

Reviews.Title: It is hard to use except for basic conversation.
Reviews.Author: sharon o
Reviews.Content: For a basic phone it is fine.  But to change settings or any other action it is difficult.  It is impossible to download apps to it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Reality
Reviews.Author: diane
Reviews.Content: The phone broke 1 week after I got it......  :/I had to go out and buy yet another phone.....not happy

Reviews.Title: might be a good phone
Reviews.Author: Ella Clyde "lil red head"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone off the PRE PAID section of Amazon. I just found out I cant have it as a prepaid. I have spent all my money on this cell and cant even send it back now. Plus I was informed that I read the info wrong and that it states that it cant be a prepaid. I will stick with verizon. I still cant contact my son

Reviews.Title: The system software
Reviews.Author: Dylan Snyder
Reviews.Content: The operating system software is so bland. Maybe I'll go with Apple or Android next time...but my phone is worth the money I paid.

Reviews.Title: Not near as good as the Samsung Rogue, which it replaced.
Reviews.Author: John F. Weber "occasional reader"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone at the Verizon store, and replaced it on Amazon with the earlier Samsung Rogue U960.  I still use it as a backup phone, but the only reason it better than the Rogue is it is slightly smaller and lighter, and has slightly better battery life.  It also has a Skype function, which the Rogue does not have, but the Rogue has Twitter, which is more useful  to me.  The keyboard is smaller than the Rogue's, and the camera is much more limited, does not zoom, and does not take very good photos.  It is much harder to use for the Internet than the Rogue, and the only thing that it excels in is making and receiving phone calls.

Reviews.Title: Great shape and looks new
Reviews.Author: msz_asmaa
Reviews.Content: I happy to say that I have no complaints about my phone. It works fine as if it was new.

Reviews.Title: I was a pretty good phone at first.
Reviews.Author: HLZ
Reviews.Content: Okay so this phone was pretty good at first but after a few months it starts to glitch out.Bad- you lock your phone but somehow unlocks in your pocket in calls someone- doesn't keep pic on home screens and lock screens- doesn't hold many text- when text conversation is full you go to ease them you have to wait for the phone to turn back on to text again- when looking at picture it starts to scroll by its self when you don't want it- etc.Good- makes calls- takes pictures and video pretty good quality- plays music

Reviews.Title: Samsung Reality
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah Thoms
Reviews.Content: I was in a bind, the touch screen on my LG Cosmos was not working.  I was in need of a phone and quick.  I received the phone in 3 days after I purchased it.  Minor dings on the sides, probably from being dropped once or twice, but everything worked correctly.

Reviews.Title: This phone saved my life.
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: I had the same exact phone but it stopped working.I loved that phone.This is the best of the basic phones.For someone like me who doesn't want the data plan, is perfect.The truth is that they don't make good basic phones anymore.Carriers want you to sign up for a data plan.That creates more expenses.I just hope this phone last longer this time.It should've said in the description that  "the charger is not included"though.

Reviews.Title: phone not work
Reviews.Author: barbara fraley
Reviews.Content: does not work will not hold charge  have to hold charger & then no charge the bars move like it is charging but it will not charge same as my old phone need refund asap had to buy phone from verizon

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: bri19
Reviews.Content: the screen didnt work very well and it kept shutting off it was a waste of money dont waste your time

Reviews.Title: I really like it
Reviews.Author: S. handshoe "momof4girls"
Reviews.Content: This phone is very easy to use. My daughter down graded to this and she says its great for talking and awesome for texting

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal
Reviews.Author: JAT
Reviews.Content: Felt as thought I got an incredible deal on this phone.  It will be a Christmas present for my son and I know he will absolutely love it!

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Ds
Reviews.Content: I absolutly hate this phone... I have had 2 of them and both of them should be nothing but paper weights. The first ones screen stopped working after just 2 months. And the second has terrible sound quality as well you have to click an inch above anything you want to open. Dont buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: couldnt use
Reviews.Author: pam
Reviews.Content: couldnt use for prepaid phone so i got another one and that one worked anyone looking 4 cellphones that r prepaid or not preapid come and lokk here

Reviews.Title: Reality check
Reviews.Author: L. Barker
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my original phone which suffered from water damage. It's nothing fancy, it does the job. I like the keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Samsung reality
Reviews.Author: E. Dem
Reviews.Content: It is an ok fone. Hate how it don't keep pic on home screens and lock screens. Can not get any apps.

Reviews.Title: Samsung SCH U370 Reality
Reviews.Author: Rawlin Jernigan Jr
Reviews.Content: A very good & an awesom phone. The guy i bought it from was generous enough to get this phone for me. The first time I was not able to get it activated so I returned the phone & it was replaced generously & now i am enjoying using the phone & still getting use to it & learning about it. I would recomend this phone to anybody that wants to get a cool phone.
